lexUnit.name: proficiency.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the fact of being competent and skilled

sentence.text: 15.31 Pupils should have increasing opportunities to develop proficiency in spoken Standard English , in contexts where it is evidently appropriate .
I have friends in Holland who are to visit next August and I wished to acquire some degree of proficiency in their language by then . "
